mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y', WITHDRAW_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO as boardNo, b.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle, m.NICKNAME as memberNickname, b.BOARD_CREAT_DATE as boardCreateDate, b.READ_COUNT as boardViewCount, COUNT(l.MEMBER_NO) AS boardLikeCount FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN "LIKE" l ON b.BOARD_NO = l.BOARD_NO WHERE b.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY b.BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_TITLE, m.NICKNAME, b.BOARD_CREAT_DATE, b.READ_COUNT ORDER BY b.BOARD_CREAT_DATE DESC

SELECT c.COMMENT_NO, c.COMMENT_CONTENT, c.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE as commentCreateDate, c.BOARD_NO, m.NICKNAME as memberNickname, COALESCE(cl_agg.LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS likes FROM "COMMENT" c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COMMENT_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM "COMMENT_LIKE" GROUP BY COMMENT_NO ) cl_agg ON c.COMMENT_NO = cl_agg.COMMENT_NO WHERE c.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND c.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY c.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, TEL AS tel, EMAIL AS email, ADDRESS AS address FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, NAME, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE AS profileImage FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER
NICKNAME = #{nickname},
PROFILE_IMAGE = #{profileImagePath},
WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID FROM FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
